[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview-decoder](./harp-mapview-decoder.md) &gt; [TileLoader](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.md)

## TileLoader class

The \[\[TileLoader\]\] manages the different states of loading and decoding for a \[\[Tile\]\]. Used by the \[\[TileDataSource\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class TileLoader 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(dataSource, tileKey, dataProvider, tileDecoder, priority)](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader._constructor_.md) |  | Set up loading of a single \[\[Tile\]\]. |

|  [dataSource](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.datasource.md) |  | [DataSource](./harp-mapview.datasource.md) |  |
|  [decodedTile](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.decodedtile.md) |  | [DecodedTile](./harp-datasource-protocol.decodedtile.md) | The result of decoding the <code>payload</code>: The \[\[DecodedTile\]\]. |
|  [donePromise](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.donepromise.md) |  | Promise&lt;[TileLoaderState](./harp-mapview.tileloaderstate.md)<!-- -->&gt; | The promise which is resolved when loading and decoding have finished. |
|  [error](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.error.md) |  | Error | Error object if loading or decoding failed. |
|  [isFinished](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.isfinished.md) |  | boolean | Return <code>true</code> if \[\[Tile\]\] is still loading, <code>false</code> otherwise. |
|  [loadAbortController](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.loadabortcontroller.md) |  | AbortController | The abort controller notifying the \[\[DataProvider\]\] to cancel loading. |
|  [payload](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.payload.md) |  | ArrayBufferLike \| {} | The binary data in form of \[\[ArrayBufferLike\]\], or any object. |
|  [priority](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.priority.md) |  | number |  |
|  [rejectedDonePromise](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.rejecteddonepromise.md) |  | (state: [TileLoaderState](./harp-mapview.tileloaderstate.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | The internal function that is called when loading and decoding failed. |
|  [requestController](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.requestcontroller.md) |  | [RequestController](./harp-datasource-protocol.requestcontroller.md) | The notifying the \[\[ITileDecoder\]\] to cancel decoding. |

|  [state](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.state.md) |  | [TileLoaderState](./harp-mapview.tileloaderstate.md) | Current state of <code>TileLoader</code>. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cancel()](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.cancel.md) |  | Cancel loading of the \[\[Tile\]\]. Cancellation token is notified, an internal state is cleaned up. |
|  [cancelDecoding()](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.canceldecoding.md) |  | Cancel the decoding process. |
|  [loadAndDecode()](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.loadanddecode.md) |  | Start loading and/or proceed through the various states of loading of this tile. |
|  [onDecoded(decodedTile)](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.ondecoded.md) |  | Called when the decoding is finished, and the \[\[DecodedTile\]\] has been created. |
|  [onDone(doneState)](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.ondone.md) |  | Called when loading and decoding has finished successfully. Resolves loading promise if the state is Ready, otherwise it rejects the promise with the supplied state. |
|  [onError(error)](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.onerror.md) |  | Called when loading or decoding has finished with an error. |
|  [onLoaded(payload)](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.onloaded.md) |  | Called when binary data has been loaded. The loading state is now progressing to decoding. |
|  [startDecodeTile()](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.startdecodetile.md) |  | Start decoding the payload. |
|  [startLoading()](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.startloading.md) |  | Start loading. Only call if loading did not start yet. |
|  [updatePriority(priority)](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.updatepriority.md) |  | Update the priority of this \[\[Tile\]\]'s priority. Is effective to sort the decoding requests in the request queue (used during heavy load). |
|  [waitSettled()](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.waitsettled.md) |  | Return the current state in form of a promise. Caller can then wait for the promise to be resolved. |
